title: Voice of Rauros (3U47)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Exert Aragorn to make each companion with the Aragorn signet damage +1 until the regroup phase.
Lore:	“As he ran the cries came louder, but fainter now and desperately the horn was blowing.”
Rarity:	U
